ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTrackerDef.label: Advanced
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTrackerDef.unlockTip: May need more basic understanding of magic to perform higher tiers.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTrackerDef.label: Master
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTrackerDef.unlockTip: May need more advanced understanding of magic to perform higher tiers.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTrackerDef.label: Aspectual Magic
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTrackerDef.unlockTip: Learn more about magic types and how to cast them. May need more basic understanding of magic to perform higher tiers.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTrackerDef.label: Elemental Magic
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTrackerDef.unlockTip: Learn more about magic types and how to cast them. May need more basic understanding of magic to perform higher tiers.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTrackerDef.label: Holy Magic
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTrackerDef.unlockTip: Learn more about magic types and how to cast them. May need more basic understanding of magic to perform higher tiers.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTrackerDef.label: Training
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTrackerDef.unlockTip: Learn the basics of magic to unlock training.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Magical damage
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Understand that this world contains MP, also known as Magic Points, Mana Points or Magicule Points.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Magical penetration
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Understand that this world contains MP, also known as Magic Points, Mana Points or Magicule Points.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Magical burst shot count
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Understand that this world contains MP, also known as Magic Points, Mana Points or Magicule Points.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Magical understanding
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Understand that this world contains MP, also known as Magic Points, Mana Points or Magicule Points.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Magical sense
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Understand how to sense magic. It is everywhere! Also good to learn how to control and feel magic.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Magical types
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Understand that there are several magic types. Aspectual magic, elemental magic, holy magic, demonic magic...

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Magical casting
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Understand how to cast magic. Some pawns might need incantations or the ability to speak to perform them. If they are trained enough, they might be able to cast without that requirement.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Magical shaping
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Understand that you can shape magic in several formes. There is no limit to form the magic you want.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Magical phenomena
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Understand that you can use phenomena such as fire or wind to materialise your magic. Aspectual magic will use this to give magic their look, while elemental magic will use this to deal damage in that category.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Magical training
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Train your magic skills to evolve further.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Basics Complete
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: You learned the basics to cast magic! Try to improve what you know or learn even more about magic.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Aspectual Magic
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Aspectual magic, also known as magic schools, is magic cast directly using MP. This is the common way to cast magic. It is unaffected by physical factors for example, magical flames can't be extinguished by ordinary water. Rewrites law of nature.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Elemental Magic
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Elemental magic borrows the power of spirits. You need some sort of affinity in that given element or a blessing by spirits to perform true elemental magic. Obeys law of nature.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Holy / Demonic Magic
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Holy and demonic magic are quite different. Holy magic applies threw the power of faith in something or someone and is considered to be an elemental magic, while demonic magic utilizes MP and is mostly available by monsters. If someone have both alignments it is referred to as chaos magic.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Ball Form
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Shape magic into the form of a ball.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Blade Form
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Shape magic into the form of a flying blade.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Stream Form
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Shape magic into the form of a stream.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Wind phenomena
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Learn to play with wind magic or create a visual phenomena out of it.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Fire phenomena
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Learn to play with fire magic or create a visual phenomena out of it.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Water phenomena
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Learn to play with water magic or create a visual phenomena out of it.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Earth phenomena
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Learn to play with earth magic or create a visual phenomena out of it.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Magic perception
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: The ability to see threw magic. May enhance vision for those who can already see and might reveal whats hidden. Might fry human brains.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Slash Ability
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: You can slash the enemy with this ability.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Advanced understanding
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Advanced understanding of magic. Casting higher tier magic take longer and will need more MP.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Advanced control
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Advanced understanding how magic sense and control works. Might help you out to cast low tier magic stronger.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Advanced casting
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Advanced understanding how magic casting works. Might help you out to cast low tier magic faster.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Advanced shaping
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Advanced understanding how magic shaping works. Might help you out to cast low tier magic in different ways.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Magical compounding
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Understand that you can combine magic schools to perform a higher magic ability, for example fire and air results in lightning magic.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Advanced Complete
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: You learned advanced magic! Try to improve what you know or learn even more about magic.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Lightning phenomena
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Learn to play with lightning magic or create a visual phenomena out of it.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Magma phenomena
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Learn to play with magma magic or create a visual phenomena out of it.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Ice phenomena
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Learn to play with ice magic or create a visual phenomena out of it.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Life/Wood phenomena
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Learn to play with life/wood magic or create a visual phenomena out of it.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Master understanding
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Master understanding of magic. You can cast almost any magic but be aware of magic in this category, it is devastating.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Master control
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Master understanding how magic sense and control works. Might help you out to cast low and mid tier magic stronger.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Master casting
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Master understanding how magic casting works. Might help you out to cast low and mid tier magic faster.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Master shaping
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Master understanding how magic shaping works. Might help you out to cast low and mid tier magic in different ways.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Magical element
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Understand that you can use higher tier phenomenas like storm from wind or inferno from fire to materialise your magic. Aspectual magic will use this to give magic their look, while elemental magic will use this to deal damage in that category.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Storm phenomena
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Learn to play with storm magic or create a visual phenomena out of it.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Inferno phenomena
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Learn to play with inferno magic or create a visual phenomena out of it.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Ocean phenomena
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Learn to play with ocean magic or create a visual phenomena out of it.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Land phenomena
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Learn to play with land magic or create a visual phenomena out of it.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Wind Slash
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Shape magic into the form of a blade combined with the wind phenomena to create a wind slash. This is a basic ability and it can be enhanced if you train more.
